name: NyaaTorrents - Tahenyaa
description: Work in progress, currently not recommended.
additional_info:
v0.8.0 - (April 20, 2019) Style now for nyaa.si, also probably destroyed everything, work in progress...

v0.7.3 - (February 26, 2016) Style now applies to https://www.nyaa.se/ and https://sukebei.nyaa.se/ as well. First update in almost 3 years, wow!

v0.7.2 - (August 10, 2013) Style now applies to http://www.nyaa.se/ and http://sukebei.nyaa.se/ since they changed the domains.

v0.7.1 - (March 22, 2013) Style now applies to http://sukebei.nyaa.eu/ as well.

v0.7.0 - (July 16, 2012) Changed the background. The style is now overall a bit darker than before.

v0.6.7 - (May 14, 2012) Removed an ad between the main page and the chatbox.

v0.6.6 - (August 14, 2011) Changed the text color again.

v0.6.5 - (July 24, 2011) Changed the color of the text and did some big (barely noticeable) changes in the code.

v0.6.0 - (June 15, 2011) Fixed the problem with the disappearing download buttons.

v0.5.9 - (June 14, 2011) Quick fix to remove the ads that suddenly appeared.

v0.5.8 - (May 26, 2011) Removed a lot of unnecessary transparency, reduced the transparency of the main window and changed some of the hover colors again.

v0.5.5 - (May 9, 2011) Changed the background color of A+ torrents from blue to green, removed underlines from all links and added some hover colors instead. Also changed the look of the borders.

v0.5.2 - (May 8, 2011) Tahenyaa now only applies to URLs starting with "http://www.nyaa.eu/".

v0.5.1 - (May 8, 2011) Removed some pointless hover colors

v0.5.0 - (May 6, 2011) Initial release

discussions.name: torrent download buttons vanished.
discussions.author_name: with the last update all the download buttons got
